data.text: Argentina’s economic plan, with the support of the IMF, is intended to strengthen their economy while protecting the jobs and living standards for the Argentine people. https://t.co/1WReZzI3qq

Join the IMF ASEAN youth #Instagram photo contest by Aug 19! You can win a free trip to Bali by posting a photo capturing how your country is empowering #women in the economy or using technology to generate jobs for youth. Details 👉 https://t.co/aDsuIu8ZFk   #IMF_VTI https://t.co/UNNEPHEHx4

New Argentine economic plan establishes a minimum for federal government spending on social assistance programs, such as conditional cash transfers for the poor. If economy worsens, government can increase spending by up to 0.2 percent of GDP per year https://t.co/mOiLcCH2y3

#Argentina has put in place a new economic plan that is designed to put the country’s debt on a firm downward path, reduce inflation, and reinforce the independence of the central bank https://t.co/6XHpgpJmX8 https://t.co/CL4baKgnun
#Argentina’s new economic plan is expected to restore financial markets’ confidence and relieve the strain on the country’s ability to pay its bills https://t.co/3KJ2dcX1fh https://t.co/FnqgFrgOOp

For both growth and fairness in Middle East and North Africa (#MENA), let's choose health, education, and social protection over energy #subsidies and large public wage bills. See a new paper https://t.co/mAex3ozdcj. Watch video https://t.co/GKdAElDYje  #Opportunity4MENA https://t.co/b4AabCMVku

#MiddleEast and North Africa (#MENA) spend less than 11% of their GDP on social safety nets, health, and education, compared to 19% in Emerging Europe. Accelerating reforms will create more room for priority spending. Read speech by Jihad Azour  https://t.co/U2jPbYGb6C  #AEF2018 https://t.co/3O11wDg1M9

Azour at #AEF2018 - The IMF believes that societies flourish when there are opportunities for all. It is key that countries of the region invest in their talented young and strive to enhance opportunities for interaction with the rest of the world.

Live Now: Watch live webcast of the #ArabEconomicForum opening session. Speakers include Jihad Azour, Director of Middle East and Central Asia Dept #AEF2018  https://t.co/BlTDRwXuMa #Opportunity4MENA https://t.co/5CVPtOD2kH
